block.p: Meredith Anne Hudes and Jorge Alberto Zamudio were married on Friday at Temple Emanu-El in New York. Rabbi David M. Posner performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Zamudio, 34, is a delivery room nurse at Lenox Hill Hospital in New York. She received a bachelor's degree in nursing from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y. She is a daughter of Nana Richter Hudes of New York and the late Barton Hudes, who lived in Clearwater, Fla.,
Meredith Anne Hudes and Jorge Alberto Zamudio were married on Friday at Temple Emanu-El in New York. Rabbi David M. Posner performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Zamudio, 34, is a delivery room nurse at Lenox Hill Hospital in New York. She received a bachelor's degree in nursing from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y. She is a daughter of Nana Richter Hudes of New York and the late Barton Hudes, who lived in Clearwater, Fla.,
Mr. Zamudio, 40, is a Web site design consultant in New York. He is a son of Beyne Feliciano of Bloomfield, N.J., and the late Demetrio Zamundio, who lived in Lima, Peru.
